archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Close Resource Order
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description This process monitors the status of the order and changes the status to closed when it is completed. Extended Description The objective of the Close Resource Order processes is to close a resource order when the resource provisioning activities have been completed. These processes monitor the status of all open resource orders, and recognize that a resource order is ready to be closed when the status is changed to completed. Explanatory Reserved for future use.
